title: Sunak Still in Race, Says Former Minister Andrew Mitchell
itunes:title: Sunak Still in Race, Says Former Minister Andrew Mitchell
description:
Former Cabinet Minister Andrew Mitchell says Rishi Sunak has the experience to deal with the economic challenges, having been bloodied by the pandemic. On the UK's frozen overseas aid budget, he tells Bloomberg's Caroline Hepker and Yuan Potts that it's literally taking the food off the plates of starving children. Plus Bloomberg's Francine Lacqua and Lizzy Burden discuss the nightmare scenario laid out by the Bank of England, and Kantar's CEO Craig Watkins says the pessimism is easily seen in the latest polling. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
